colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @087A *, ,(CES RNAM GZHAG RIM PA'I RNAM BSHAD DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I GNAD KYI DON GSAL BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RNAL 'BYOR BA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG SHAR TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS GANGS RI'I DBANG PO 'O DE GUNG RGYAL GYI LHA ZHOL BYAMS PA GLING MING GZHAN GSANG SNGAGS NANG ZHES BYA BA'I RI KHROD DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DKA' BZHI 'DZIN PA GA-YEG SDE BA BSOD NAMS DPAL BZANG NGO, ,'DI LA BRTEN NAS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS KUN TU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI, ,RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
